name: SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-07542）
product: ["SAP SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform"]
description: SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform是德国思爱普（SAP）公司的一套商业智能软件和企业绩效解决方案套件。SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform存在信息泄露漏洞，该漏洞源于应用对于敏感信息保护不足，攻击者可利用该漏洞导致信息泄露。
solution:
目前厂商已发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网:
https://support.sap.com/en/my-support/knowledge-base/security-notes-news/march-2025.html
patch: SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform信息泄露漏洞（CNVD-2025-07542）的补丁
